title: Difficulty Breathing
description: Rapid, labored, or noisy breathing; open-mouth breathing in cats; blue or pale gums

title: Seizures
description: Uncontrolled muscle activity, loss of consciousness, drooling, or loss of bladder/bowel control

title: Severe Vomiting/Diarrhea
description: Persistent vomiting or diarrhea, especially with blood or signs of dehydration

title: Unconsciousness
description: Pet is unresponsive to stimuli, unable to wake up, or in a coma-like state

title: Severe Trauma
description: Major injuries from accidents, falls, bites, or penetrating wounds

title: Toxic Ingestion
description: Consumption of poisonous substances, medications, or toxic plants

title: Heatstroke
description: Excessive panting, drooling, weakness, collapse, or bright red gums

title: Bloat/Gastric Dilation
description: Distended abdomen, unsuccessful vomiting attempts, restlessness, and signs of pain
